meanings.definition: Relating to or representing natural scenery.
meanings.sent1: The scenic view from the hill was breathtaking.
meanings.sent2: She loved to paint the scenic landscapes she saw on her travels.
meanings.sent3: The scenic picnic spot was so beautiful that even the ants stopped to admire it.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a scenic canvas, filled with memories of green meadows and blue skies.
meanings.sent5: The scenic beauty of the waterfall left a lasting impression on her heart.

meanings.definition: The visual features of a landscape.
meanings.sent1: The sceneries in the painting looked like they came to life.
meanings.sent2: He captured the sceneries of the countryside in his photographs.
meanings.sent3: The tourist got lost in the scenic beauty and forgot the way back to the hotel.
meanings.sent4: The sceneries of the national park were like a symphony of colors and shapes.
meanings.sent5: The guidebook described the scenic spots with vivid detail, making them irresistible to visit.
